body:
Hello,  I have been looking into simulating different air Pollutant levels in LB.  Appreciate any advice or former experience in doing so.   

Is there a way to break the turbidity levels into different air inputs of particles (in different sizes) ? Cheers Shim

replies.body: My knowledge is very limited about modeling pollution but you may want to check tools like envimet and see if they can do these type of analysis.
